Class BoardSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.bellarmine.emc.BoardSquare

  • public class BoardSquare
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a square of the chessboard.
    Version:
    1.0 Programming Project 1 Fall 2019
    Author:
    Ethan Colbert
